Information We Collect When you place an order, sign up for our newsletter, or engage with us on social media, we may collect personal details like your name, email address, phone number, and postal address. Rest assured, we only gather this information to provide you with the best possible experience and keep you in the loop about our delicious pies and exciting promotions. How We Use Your Information Your personal information is used to process your orders, communicate with you about your purchases, and provide stellar customer support. We might also send you tasty updates and exclusive offers via email, but don't worry, you can always opt out if you'd prefer not to receive them. Additionally, we analyze data trends to enhance our website functionality and improve our services. Sharing Your Information We don't believe in selling or sharing your personal information with third parties without your consent. However, we do work with trusted partners who help us run our website and provide you with top-notch service. These partners are contractually bound to keep your data safe and secure. Security Measures Protecting your personal information is our top priority. We implement robust security measures to prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction of your data. From encryption protocols to regular security audits, we take every precaution to keep your information safe and sound. Retention of Your Information We'll only keep your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. If we no longer need it, we'll securely dispose of it in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. Changes to This Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update or revise this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, so be sure to check back periodically. Your continued use of our website after any modifications indicates your acceptance of the updated terms.
